verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:1
verses.text: It came to pass after this also, that the children of Moab, and the children of Ammon, and with them other beside the Ammonites, came against Jehoshaphat to battle.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:2
verses.text: Then there came some that told Jehoshaphat, saying, There cometh a great multitude against thee from beyond the sea on this side Syria; and, behold, they be in Hazazon–tamar, which is En–gedi.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:3
verses.text: And Jehoshaphat feared, and set himself to seek the Lord, and proclaimed a fast throughout all Judah.
